[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1503345026539{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space]

[vc_cta text="Our Services" h2_google_fonts="font_family:Arimo%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" h4_google_fonts="font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal" align="center" heading_sep="yes" tag="h2" h2="Our Services" txt_align="center" i_css_animation="" css_animation=""][/vc_cta]
[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner]
[vc_cta h2="MATERNAL & CHILD HEALTH SERVICES" h2_google_fonts="font_family:Arimo%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" h4_google_fonts="font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal" txt_align="left" heading_sep="no" shape="none" style="transparent" color="grey" btn_title="Read More" btn_style="text" btn_gradient_color_1="turquoise" btn_gradient_color_2="blue" btn_custom_background="#ededed" btn_custom_text="#666" btn_outline_custom_color="#666" btn_outline_custom_hover_background="#666" btn_outline_custom_hover_text="#fff" btn_color="skincolor" btn_size="md" add_icon="left" hover="none" icon_type="icon" i_type="fontawesome" i_icon_fontawesome="fa fa-child" i_icon_openiconic="vc-oi vc-oi-dial" i_icon_typicons="typcn typcn-adjust-brightness" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-note" i_icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-heart" i_color="skincolor" i_background_style="rounded-less-outline" i_background_color="blue" i_size="lg" btn_align="left" i_css_animation="" css_animation=""]It is no secret that women have unique health issues. These include pregnancy, menstruation, menopause  and other conditions of the the female reproductive system. To address these issues, DHS have a team of exprerienced midwives, medical officers, obstetricians and gynecologists available 24hrs to offer care. We offer preconeception care where we counsel and prepare couples desiring to conceive. We also carry out antenatal care during pregnancy and conduct deliveries as well as postnatal care following delievery. Family planning services, services, screening for cervical canceer as a well as provision of vaccination to prevent cervical cancer for young girls is available. We investigate and manage couples dealing with infertility. We also care for women with other conditions like cysts, sexually transmitted diseases, menopeuse related symptoms and those with complications resulting from miscarriage.[/vc_cta]
[vc_cta h2="RADIOLOGY SERVICES" h2_google_fonts="font_family:Arimo%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" h4_google_fonts="font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal" txt_align="left" heading_sep="no" shape="none" style="transparent" color="grey" btn_title="Read More" btn_style="text" btn_gradient_color_1="turquoise" btn_gradient_color_2="blue" btn_custom_background="#ededed" btn_custom_text="#666" btn_outline_custom_color="#666" btn_outline_custom_hover_background="#666" btn_outline_custom_hover_text="#fff" btn_color="skincolor" btn_size="md" add_icon="left" hover="none" icon_type="icon" i_type="fontawesome" i_icon_fontawesome="fa fa-desktop" i_icon_openiconic="vc-oi vc-oi-dial" i_icon_typicons="typcn typcn-adjust-brightness" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-note" i_icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-heart" i_color="skincolor" i_background_style="rounded-less-outline" i_background_color="blue" i_size="lg" btn_align="left" i_css_animation="" css_animation=""]A variety of imaging techniques such as digital X-ray available 24hrs, Ultrasound available 24hrs, Echo & ECG. Vascular Doppler[/vc_cta]
[vc_cta h2="SURGICAL SERVICES" h2_google_fonts="font_family:Arimo%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" h4_google_fonts="font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal" txt_align="left" heading_sep="no" shape="none" style="transparent" color="grey" btn_title="Read More" btn_style="text" btn_gradient_color_1="turquoise" btn_gradient_color_2="blue" btn_custom_background="#ededed" btn_custom_text="#666" btn_outline_custom_color="#666" btn_outline_custom_hover_background="#666" btn_outline_custom_hover_text="#fff" btn_color="skincolor" btn_size="md" add_icon="left" hover="none" icon_type="icon" i_type="fontawesome" i_icon_fontawesome="fa fa-medkit" i_icon_openiconic="vc-oi vc-oi-dial" i_icon_typicons="typcn typcn-adjust-brightness" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-note" i_icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-heart" i_color="skincolor" i_background_style="rounded-less-outline" i_background_color="blue" i_size="lg" btn_align="left" i_css_animation="" css_animation=""]Doctors Hospital has a fully equipped operating theatre in which emergency and elective operations can be done by our medical officers and specialists.
We have general surgeons, Urologists and on appointment basis.

Minor surgery services especially for patients who may get accidents e.g. falls and cuts (surgical toilet suturing) are usually performed by the resident doctors. Other surgical procedures carried out include:

  • Minimally invasive surgery (Laparoscopic surgery) this is one of our latest achievement at the unit.
  • Medical male circumcision.
  • Caesarian section
  • Orthopaedic procedures like internal fixation etc.
  • Biopsies
  • Incision and drainage.
  • Perineoraphy
  • Evacuations
  • Hernioraphy
  • Laparotomies
  • Excisions

[/vc_cta]

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner]
[vc_cta h2="DENTAL SURGERY SERVICES" h2_google_fonts="font_family:Arimo%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" h4_google_fonts="font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal" txt_align="left" heading_sep="no" shape="none" style="transparent" color="grey" btn_title="Read More" btn_style="text" btn_gradient_color_1="turquoise" btn_gradient_color_2="blue" btn_custom_background="#ededed" btn_custom_text="#666" btn_outline_custom_color="#666" btn_outline_custom_hover_background="#666" btn_outline_custom_hover_text="#fff" btn_color="skincolor" btn_size="md" add_icon="left" hover="none" icon_type="icon" i_type="fontawesome" i_icon_fontawesome="fa fa-male" i_icon_openiconic="vc-oi vc-oi-dial" i_icon_typicons="typcn typcn-adjust-brightness" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-note" i_icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-heart" i_color="skincolor" i_background_style="rounded-less-outline" i_background_color="blue" i_size="lg" btn_align="left" i_css_animation="" css_animation=""]We have a full time Dental surgeon who works Monday to Saturday (08:00hours to 19:00hours) and can be available on Sundays on appointment basis. The dental services include the following;

  • Oral examination
  • Tooth extractions
  • Fillings such as Amalgam, Glass ionomer and composite.
  • Dentures (Removable artificial tooth replacements)
  • Bridges (Permanent tooth replacements)
  • Scaling and polishing (professional dental cleaning)
  • Community Oral health Education
  • Management of other oral health conditions
  • Root canal Treatment
  • Dental X-ray services

[/vc_cta]

[vc_cta h2="AMBULANCE SERVICES" h2_google_fonts="font_family:Arimo%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" h4_google_fonts="font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal" txt_align="left" heading_sep="no" shape="none" style="transparent" color="grey" btn_title="Read More" btn_style="text" btn_gradient_color_1="turquoise" btn_gradient_color_2="blue" btn_custom_background="#ededed" btn_custom_text="#666" btn_outline_custom_color="#666" btn_outline_custom_hover_background="#666" btn_outline_custom_hover_text="#fff" btn_color="skincolor" btn_size="md" add_icon="left" hover="none" icon_type="icon" i_type="fontawesome" i_icon_fontawesome="fa fa-ambulance" i_icon_openiconic="vc-oi vc-oi-dial" i_icon_typicons="typcn typcn-adjust-brightness" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-note" i_icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-heart" i_color="skincolor" i_background_style="rounded-less-outline" i_background_color="blue" i_size="lg" btn_align="left" i_css_animation="" css_animation=""]Available 24 hours a day for easy referral and evacuation of patients.[/vc_cta]
[vc_cta h2="LABORATORY SERVICES" h2_google_fonts="font_family:Arimo%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" h4_google_fonts="font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal" txt_align="left" heading_sep="no" shape="none" style="transparent" color="grey" btn_title="Read More" btn_style="text" btn_gradient_color_1="turquoise" btn_gradient_color_2="blue" btn_custom_background="#ededed" btn_custom_text="#666" btn_outline_custom_color="#666" btn_outline_custom_hover_background="#666" btn_outline_custom_hover_text="#fff" btn_color="skincolor" btn_size="md" add_icon="left" hover="none" icon_type="icon" i_type="fontawesome" i_icon_fontawesome="fa fa-flask" i_icon_openiconic="vc-oi vc-oi-dial" i_icon_typicons="typcn typcn-adjust-brightness" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-note" i_icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-heart" i_color="skincolor" i_background_style="rounded-less-outline" i_background_color="blue" i_size="lg" btn_align="left" i_css_animation="" css_animation=""] We provide a wide range of diagnostic testing services at DHS.[/vc_cta]
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner]
[vc_cta h2="GENERAL MEDICAL SERVICES" h2_google_fonts="font_family:Arimo%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" h4_google_fonts="font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal" txt_align="left" heading_sep="no" shape="none" style="transparent" color="grey" btn_title="Read More" btn_style="text" btn_gradient_color_1="turquoise" btn_gradient_color_2="blue" btn_custom_background="#ededed" btn_custom_text="#666" btn_outline_custom_color="#666" btn_outline_custom_hover_background="#666" btn_outline_custom_hover_text="#fff" btn_color="skincolor" btn_size="md" add_icon="left" hover="none" icon_type="icon" i_type="fontawesome" i_icon_fontawesome="fa fa-stethoscope" i_icon_openiconic="vc-oi vc-oi-dial" i_icon_typicons="typcn typcn-adjust-brightness" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-note" i_icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-heart" i_color="skincolor" i_background_style="rounded-less-outline" i_background_color="blue" i_size="lg" btn_align="left" i_css_animation="" css_animation=""]Our General practioners offer various family healthcare services.[/vc_cta]
[vc_cta h2="SPECIALIST CLINICS" h2_google_fonts="font_family:Arimo%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" h4_google_fonts="font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal" txt_align="left" heading_sep="no" shape="none" style="transparent" color="grey" btn_title="Read More" btn_style="text" btn_gradient_color_1="turquoise" btn_gradient_color_2="blue" btn_custom_background="#ededed" btn_custom_text="#666" btn_outline_custom_color="#666" btn_outline_custom_hover_background="#666" btn_outline_custom_hover_text="#fff" btn_color="skincolor" btn_size="md" add_icon="left" hover="none" icon_type="icon" i_type="fontawesome" i_icon_fontawesome="fa fa-user-md" i_icon_openiconic="vc-oi vc-oi-dial" i_icon_typicons="typcn typcn-adjust-brightness" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-note" i_icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-heart" i_color="skincolor" i_background_style="rounded-less-outline" i_background_color="blue" i_size="lg" btn_align="left" i_css_animation="" css_animation=""]Specific days for Gynaecology and obstetrics, Pediatrics, Ear-Nose & Throat, Orthopaedic, Emergencies etc.[/vc_cta]
[vc_cta h2="VACCINATION" h2_google_fonts="font_family:Arimo%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" h4_google_fonts="font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal" txt_align="left" heading_sep="no" shape="none" style="transparent" color="grey" btn_title="Read More" btn_style="text" btn_gradient_color_1="turquoise" btn_gradient_color_2="blue" btn_custom_background="#ededed" btn_custom_text="#666" btn_outline_custom_color="#666" btn_outline_custom_hover_background="#666" btn_outline_custom_hover_text="#fff" btn_color="skincolor" btn_size="md" add_icon="left" hover="none" icon_type="icon" i_type="fontawesome" i_icon_fontawesome="fa fa-hospital-o" i_icon_openiconic="vc-oi vc-oi-dial" i_icon_typicons="typcn typcn-adjust-brightness" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-note" i_icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-heart" i_color="skincolor" i_background_style="rounded-less-outline" i_background_color="blue" i_size="lg" btn_align="left" i_css_animation="" css_animation=""]The responsibility to see ageneration free from morbidity , mortality arising from contracting immunisable diseases is yours and ours.

Vaccination under the Uganda National Expanded Program on immunisation (UNEPI) is scheduled every wednesday and sunday of the week from 9:00am – 4:00pm, Unable to come on wednesday please do come on sunday. Vaccination aginst immunisable diseases is avaliable every day 24 hours.[/vc_cta]

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner]
[vc_cta h2="LAPAROSCOPIC SURGERY" h2_google_fonts="font_family:Arimo%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" h4_google_fonts="font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal" txt_align="left" heading_sep="no" shape="none" style="transparent" color="grey" btn_title="Read More" btn_style="text" btn_gradient_color_1="turquoise" btn_gradient_color_2="blue" btn_custom_background="#ededed" btn_custom_text="#666" btn_outline_custom_color="#666" btn_outline_custom_hover_background="#666" btn_outline_custom_hover_text="#fff" btn_color="skincolor" btn_size="md" add_icon="left" hover="none" icon_type="icon" i_type="fontawesome" i_icon_fontawesome="fa fa-heartbeat" i_icon_openiconic="vc-oi vc-oi-dial" i_icon_typicons="typcn typcn-adjust-brightness" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-note" i_icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-heart" i_color="skincolor" i_background_style="rounded-less-outline" i_background_color="blue" i_size="lg" btn_align="left" i_css_animation="" css_animation=""]A modern surgical technique in which operations are performed far from their location through small incisions elsewhere in the body.[/vc_cta]
[vc_cta h2="HOME CARE" h2_google_fonts="font_family:Arimo%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" h4_google_fonts="font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal" txt_align="left" heading_sep="no" shape="none" style="transparent" color="grey" btn_title="Read More" btn_style="text" btn_gradient_color_1="turquoise" btn_gradient_color_2="blue" btn_custom_background="#ededed" btn_custom_text="#666" btn_outline_custom_color="#666" btn_outline_custom_hover_background="#666" btn_outline_custom_hover_text="#fff" btn_color="skincolor" btn_size="md" add_icon="left" hover="none" icon_type="icon" i_type="fontawesome" i_icon_fontawesome="fa fa-home" i_icon_openiconic="vc-oi vc-oi-dial" i_icon_typicons="typcn typcn-adjust-brightness" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-note" i_icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-heart" i_color="skincolor" i_background_style="rounded-less-outline" i_background_color="blue" i_size="lg" btn_align="left" i_css_animation="" css_animation=""]People with special needs stay in their homes as we attend to them. It might be for people who are older, chronically ill, recovering from surgery or disabled.[/vc_cta]
[vc_cta h2="CSR ACTIVITIES" h2_google_fonts="font_family:Arimo%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" h4_google_fonts="font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal" txt_align="left" heading_sep="no" shape="none" style="transparent" color="grey" btn_title="Read More" btn_style="text" btn_gradient_color_1="turquoise" btn_gradient_color_2="blue" btn_custom_background="#ededed" btn_custom_text="#666" btn_outline_custom_color="#666" btn_outline_custom_hover_background="#666" btn_outline_custom_hover_text="#fff" btn_color="skincolor" btn_size="md" add_icon="left" hover="none" icon_type="icon" i_type="fontawesome" i_icon_fontawesome="fa fa-users" i_icon_openiconic="vc-oi vc-oi-dial" i_icon_typicons="typcn typcn-adjust-brightness" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-note" i_icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-heart" i_color="skincolor" i_background_style="rounded-less-outline" i_background_color="blue" i_size="lg" btn_align="left" i_css_animation="" css_animation=""]

Through Corporate social responsibility, we ensure our services have a positive effect on the general well-being of the public.

[/vc_cta]

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
